mapper.select: SELECT ec.`id`, ec.`title`, ec.`cover`, ec.`lesson_num`, ec.`price`, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.`title` AS subjectLevelOne, es2.`title` AS subjectLevelTwo FROM `edu_course` AS ec LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_course_description` AS ecd ON ec.`id`=ecd.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_teacher` AS et ON ec.`teacher_id`=et.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_subject` AS es1 ON ec.`subject_parent_id`=es1.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_subject` AS es2 ON ec.`subject_id`=es2.`id` WHERE ec.`id`=#{courseId};

SELECT ec.`id`, ec.`title`, ec.`price`, ec.`lesson_num`, ec.`cover`, ec.`buy_count`, ec.`view_count`, ecd.`description`, et.`intro`, et.`avatar`, et.`id` AS teacherId, et.`name` AS teacherName, es1.`title` AS subjectLevelOne, es2.`title` AS subjectLevelTwo FROM `edu_course` AS ec LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_course_description` AS ecd ON ec.`id`=ecd.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_teacher` AS et ON ec.`teacher_id`=et.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_subject` AS es1 ON ec.`subject_parent_id`=es1.`id` LEFT OUTER JOIN `edu_subject` AS es2 ON ec.`subject_id`=es2.`id` WHERE ec.`id`=#{courseId};
